item.description: hi ladies! looking to meet for a last minute lunch on a casual sunday!! we can discuss lots of stuff! any downton abbey fans out there? would love to discuss plans for a great 2013! i am planning to start the purpose driven life and am looking to do a spritual health plan along with the healthy plan starting up with the ladies travel.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: an inexpensive casual lunch on a sunday
